sql.name: queryXhBorrowscoreList
sql.sqlString: select a.MARRIAGE,/*婚姻分数*/ a.EDUCATION,/*文化程度*/ a.HOUSEHOLDS,/*户口登记*/ a.TOTAL_WORKYEAR,/*总工作年龄*/ a.SOCIAL_SECURITY,/*社保*/ a.HOUSE,/*住房情况*/ a.VECHICLE,/*车辆情况*/ a.OFFICE_TYPE,/*单位性质*/ a.OFFICE_POSITION,/*单位岗位性质*/ a.OFFICE_YEAR,/*单位工作年限*/ a.CERTIFICATION,/*职业证书*/ a.MONTH_SALARY,/*月收入*/ a.CONSUME_PERCENT,/*月供支出比*/ a.CREDIT_RECORD,/*信用记录*/ a.OLD_CUSTOMER,/*老客户*/ a.PUBLIC_RECORD,/*公共记录*/ a.EMPLOYEE_ID,/*评分人*/ a.JKSQ_ID,/*借款申请ID*/ a.SCORE_TYPE,/*评分类型 0:门店评分,1：信审评分*/ a.AGE,/*年龄分数*/ a.HEALTH_STATE,/*健康状况*/ a.ID from XH_BORROWSCORE a where 1=1 $sql
